To add a new list, select the plus button.\n\nTo delete a list, select and hold the list then select the trash icon.

To add a list item, enter the item and then select the Add button.

To drag and drop a list item, use the grip icon (on the right of the list item) to move the item up or down.

To edit a list item, double tap the item.

To delete a list item, swipe the item to the left or right.

To edit the name of the list, select the pencil icon.
